#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long mod=1000000007;
long long pwr(long long b,long long e)
{
        long long res = 1;
        while(e>0)
        {
                if(e%2==1)
                        res = (res*b)%mod;
                e/=2;
                b = (b*b)%mod;
        }
        return res;
}
int main()
{
    int T;
    long long N,M;
  
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
       scanf("%lld%lld",&N,&M);
       long long t,Ans=0;
       if(N==1){
          printf("%lld\n",M);
          continue;
       }
       Ans=(M*(M-1))%mod;
       if(N==2){
          printf("%lld\n",Ans);
          continue;
       }
       if(M<3){
          printf("0\n");
          continue;
       }
       t=pwr(M-2,N-2);
       Ans=(Ans*t)%mod;
       printf("%lld\n",Ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
